alert.note: Alert for Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marlboro County through 630 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bennettsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Mccoll, Chavistown, Gibson and Tatum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
